content.question: What is the significance of the date chosen for the event mentioned in the article?

choices.label: The date was selected so that people could participate outdoors.
The date is related to the invention of Chinese characters.
The date is related to the work of a famous Chinese poet.

content.answer: The date is related to the invention of Chinese characters.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
